revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Santalune Forest |image = [[File:Santalune Forest.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Santalune Forest. |tokens = 400,000 |location = Between Routes 2 and 3. }} '''Santalune Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 5,803,020 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie || rowspan=4|[[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Youngster Joey || rowspan=4|[[File:Scatterbug.png|40px]] Scatterbug, [[File:Fletchling.png|40px]] Fletchling |- | [[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod |- | [[File:Weedle.png|40px]] Weedle |- | [[File:Kakuna.png|40px]] Kakuna |- | [[File:Pansage.png|40px]] Pansage || rowspan=5|[[File:Lass.png|40px]] Lass Anna || rowspan=5|[[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu |- | [[File:Pansear.png|40px]] Pansear |- | [[File:Panpour.png|40px]] Panpour |- | [[File:Fletchling.png|40px]] Fletchling |- | [[File:Scatterbug.png|40px]] Scatterbug |}

Base Health |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu || rowspan=2|<center> 51,738,600 ||rowspan=2|[[File:Lass.png|40px]] Lass Lise || [[File:Weedle.png|40px]] Weedle || <center> 24,303,000 |- | [[File:Bunnelby.png|40px]] Bunnelby || <center> 27,303,000 |}
